snippet: Lionel Messi’s public relations firm said a Spanish state prosecutor had agreed to drop him from a tax fraud case.
abstract: Spanish state prosecutors drop soccer star Lionel Messi from tax fraud case; Messi's father, Jorge Horacio Messi, is under investigation for unpaid taxes from his son's image rights from 2007 to 2009.
lead_paragraph: Lionel Messi’s public relations firm said a Spanish state prosecutor had agreed to drop him from a tax fraud case.

headline.main: Messi Case Said to be Dropped
headline.print_headline: Messi Case Said to Be Dropped
